BG3 Duke Ravengard's Longsword Information

Stirring Execution: When you kill an enemy, allies within 9m gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma Modifier (minimum 1). Commander's Strike: Direct an ally to strike a foe. The ally uses a reaction on their next turn to make a weapon Strike attack. Range: 1.5m
